long_desc.thetext:
Created an attachment (id=1001) adds -H (human readable) to unexpunge
This is against 2.3.7, but probably ports forward cleanly. Just filing it so I don't lose track!
This is missing a some man page text.
Created an attachment (id=1042) Update man page and usage() function.
Comments before I commit these changes?
Created an attachment (id=1267) adds a recursive and count options
Created an attachment (id=1268) make the default output human readable, includes the spacing
Created an attachment (id=1269) adds an option to print output in "machine readable", one message per line
*** Bug 3201 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Sorry, I wasn't clear. This bug should be used for the human readable stuff. Another bug should be used for recursive & counts, etc.
(From update of attachment 1267) Moving this patch to a different bug
(From update of attachment 1269) recursive and count patch moved to Bug 3244, machine output moved to 3245.

attachment.desc: Update man page and usage() function.
adds a recursive and count options
make the default output human readable, includes the spacing
adds an option to print output in "machine readable", one message per line
